FUTURE_DATE: The selected period is in the futur or not valid
MAX_PERIOD: days is the maximum period selectable for offline export
PARTIAL_AVAILABLE_MESSAGE: is partially available for selected period. Valid period:

SENSORS.STEP_1_TEXT_PART1: Select the period for export (for periods longer than
SENSORS.STEP_1_TEXT_PART2: days, the data will be sent via email due to processing times)
SENSORS.STEP_2_TEXT: Select the sensor class, optional aggregation, and export format

RADAR.STEP_1_TEXT: Select the period for export, the data will be sent via email due to processing times.
RADAR.STEP_2_TEXT: Select the radar product from which you want to export data.
RADAR.MAIL_MESSAGE:
You will receive the data via email once the processing is complete.
This operation may take up to 24 hours depending on the size of the data.
